myopenmath.statement:
Use the contour map to estimate the sign of the derivatives at point P.
\displaystyle{\frac{{\partial{f}}}{{\partial{x}}}} is
negative (0)/label
positive (0)
at point P
\displaystyle{\frac{{\partial{f}}}{{\partial{y}}}} is
negative (0)/label
positive (0)
at point P
\displaystyle{\frac{{\partial^{{2}}{f}}}{{\partial{x}^{{2}}}}} is
negative (0)/label
positive (0)
at point P
\displaystyle{\frac{{\partial^{{2}}{f}}}{{\partial{y}^{{2}}}}} is
negative (0)/label
positive (0)
at point P
\displaystyle{\frac{{\partial^{{2}}{f}}}{{\partial{x}\partial{y}}}} is
negative (0)/label
positive (0)
at point P
